desc: Learn advanced harmony with 16 modes in rock and groove formats (funk, RnB, blues, etc…) that are fun and RELEVANT to the students. This is where music schools fall short. There are not enough really cool groove examples for advanced harmonic theory that speaks to the non-jazz guitar players.

layout.text: Learn advanced harmonic chord scales in rock and groove formats (funk, RnB, blues, etc…)  that are fun and RELEVANT
